channel.title: Knights on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Knights on Game6r

item.title: Medieval game - knights crusaders
item.description: According to the plot of this exciting toy, you are going to a distant fairy-tale kingdom attacked by an army of evil monsters. As the most experienced of the local warlords, try to organize the defense of the royal castles. Arrange your warriors so that they can inflict maximum damage on enemy soldiers.
